description:
Conan, Ayumi, Genta, and Mitsuhiko meet the Silver Detectives Tokunaga, Mutsuhiko, Ginta, and Yasuko who find a stolen bicycle. The next day, a young man named Kuroda is found dead in his home. The Silver Detectives are the first to discover the body. While pursuing a hooligan they caught littering, they chased him into the house where they found the body. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Detective Boys vs the Silver Detectives
فريق المتحرين الصغار ضد فريق المتحرين الكبار
少年探偵団VS老人[シルバー]探偵団
